title: Bauhaus style, similar to but not Kabel
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063934im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schweinsteiger_3702.png)

Anyone know what this font is please?

A colleague commented that this isn't available digitally, but I have a feeling this image is from some Champion's League TV coverage which suggests otherwise…

Thank you.

Font:
